infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera for safety scanning to analyze your environment for potential hazards and emergency preparedness.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save safety scan results and images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to provide location-based emergency alerts and show relevant safety information for your area.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to provide location-based emergency alerts and show relevant safety information for your area, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location to provide location-based emergency alerts and show relevant safety information for your area, even when the app is in the background.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ResQ Pro to access your camera for safety scanning and emergency preparedness analysis.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ResQ Pro to save safety scan images to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow ResQ Pro to save safety scan images to your photo library.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: This app uses your location to provide location-based emergency alerts and show relevant safety information for your area, even when the app is in the background.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: This app uses your location to provide location-based emergency alerts and show relevant safety information for your area, even when the app is in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: This app uses your location to provide location-based emergency alerts and show relevant safety information for your area.
